国対: (こくたい) - Committee of the National Diet
国尽くし: (くにずくし) - enumeration of the names of countries
国常立尊: (くにのとこたちのみこと) - Kuninotokotachi no Mikoto (eternal god of the land)
国幣社: (こくへいしゃ) - shrine receiving offerings from the provincial government (pre-Meiji) or the national treasury (post-Meiji)
国府: (こふ) - (こくふ only)   Nationalist Government (of China; i.e. under the Kuomintang); provincial office (under the ritsuryo system)/provincial capital
国庫に納まった金: (こっこにおさまったかね) - money paid to the (National) Treasury
国庫補助: (こっこほじょ) - government subsidy; state aid; state assistance
国恥記念日: (こくちきねんび) - day of national humiliation (used in China for certain anniversaries of incidents where Japan humiliated China)
国恩: (こくおん) - one's debt to one's country
国情: (こくじょう) - conditions of a country
国慶節: (こっけいせつ) - anniversary of founding (of PRC); national celebration time
国手: (こくしゅ) - skilled physician; noted doctor; master
国政: (こくせい) - national politics; political situation; statecraft; body politic
国政を司る: (こくせいをつかさどる) - to administer the affairs of state
国政調査権: (こくせいちょうさけん) - parliamentary investigation rights
国文学史: (こくぶんがくし) - history of Japanese literature
国文科: (こくぶんか) - department of Japanese literature
国旗を掲げる: (こっきをかかげる) - to hoist the national flag
国有企業: (こくゆうきぎょう) - state-owned enterprise; SOE
国有林野: (こくゆうりんや) - state-owned forests and fields
国有財産: (こくゆうざいさん) - national property
国有鉄道: (こくゆうてつどう) - national railway
国本: (こくほん) - foundation of the nation
国柄: (くにがら) - national character; regional character
国構え: (くにがまえ) - kanji "box" or "country" radical (radical 31); radical consisting of an enclosing box
国権: (こっけん) - power of the state; national sovereignty; sovereign rights
国民: (kokumin) - pessoas (de um país), nação, cidadão, nacional
国民の休日: (こくみんのきゅうじつ) - national holiday (by law, any weekday that falls between two other national holidays)
国民の祝日: (こくみんのしゅくじつ) - public holidays; national holidays
国民不在: (こくみんふざい) - out of touch with the voters; indifferent to the concerns of the people
国民主権: (こくみんしゅけん) - sovereignty of the people
国民休暇村: (こくみんきゅうかむら) - national vacation village
国民体育大会: (こくみんたいいくたいかい) - National Athletic Meet
国民保健サービス: (こくみんほけんサービス) - NHS service (UK)
国民保護法: (こくみんほごほう) - Civil Protection Law
国民保護計画: (こくみんほごけいかく) - Civil Protection Plan
国民健康保険: (こくみんけんこうほけん) - national health insurance
国民健康保険制度: (こくみんけんこうほけんせいど) - national health insurance program (programme)
国民党: (こくみんとう) - Constitutional Nationalist Party (1910-1922); Guomindang (Chinese Nationalist Party)/Kuomintang
国民全体: (こくみんぜんたい) - whole nation; entire nation; all the people
国民可処分所得: (こくみんかしょぶんしょとく) - national disposable income
国民学校: (こくみんがっこう) - elementary school (in an educational system operated in Japan between 1941 and 1947)
国民宿舎: (こくみんしゅくしゃ) - inexpensive hotel operated by a local government
国民審査: (こくみんしんさ) - national review (as an act of a peoples' sovereignty)
国民年金: (こくみんねんきん) - national pension; government pension system
国民徴用令: (こくみんちょうようれい) - National Requisition Ordinance
国民性: (こくみんせい) - national traits or character; nationality
国民感情: (こくみんかんじょう) - national mood; national sentiment; national feeling
国民所得: (こくみんしょとく) - national income
国民投票: (こくみんとうひょう) - national referendum
国民政府: (こくみんせいふ) - Nationalist Government (of China; i.e. under the Kuomintang)
国民新: (こくみんしん) - Kokumin Shinto; People's New Party (Japanese political party)
国民新党: (こくみんしんとう) - Kokumin Shinto; People's New Party (Japanese political party)
国民服: (こくみんふく) - national uniform (such as mandated for Japanese males in 1940)
国民栄誉賞: (こくみんえいよしょう) - People's Honour Award (honor); National Honour Award
国民気質: (こくみんきしつ) - national traits; national character
国民生活: (こくみんせいかつ) - the life of the people; the people's living
国民的基盤: (こくみんてききばん) - based on a nation's people; popular base
国民皆保険: (こくみんかいほけん) - medical insurance for the whole nation
国民皆兵: (こくみんかいへい) - universal conscription
国民福祉指標: (こくみんふくししひょう) - net national welfare
国民純生産: (こくみんじゅんせいさん) - net national product; NNP
国民純福祉: (こくみんじゅんふくし) - net national welfare; NNW
国民経済: (こくみんけいざい) - national economy
国民総所得: (こくみんそうしょとく) - gross national income; GNI
国民総支出: (こくみんそうししゅつ) - gross national expenditure; GNE
国民総生産: (こくみんそうせいさん) - gross national product; GNP
国民総背番号制: (こくみんそうせばんごうせい) - national citizen identification number system
国民議会: (こくみんぎかい) - national assembly (esp. France)
国民道徳: (こくみんどうとく) - national morality
国民食: (こくみんしょく) - food universally loved by all citizens; comfort food
国津神: (くにつかみ) - gods of the land; earthly deities
国漢: (こっかん) - Japanese and Chinese literature
